summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Pine Street from Twenty-fifth Avenue to Thirty-second Avenue, East Olive Street from Twenty-fifth Avenue to Thirty-second Avenue, and Twenty-seventh Avenue, Twenty-eighth Avenue, and Twenty-ninth Avenue, each from East Union Street to East Howell Street, and the west half of Thirty-second Avenue from East Pine Street to the north line of Albion Heights Addition to the City of Seattle, by grading the same in accordance with Resolution No. 557 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
